body_html:
@zhiruiwang bleach depends on html5lib.

So it would be enough to update bleach.

Extract from pipdeptree command:

tensorflow==1.5.0
  - absl-py [required: >=0.1.6, installed: 0.1.9]
    - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
  - numpy [required: >=1.12.1, installed: 1.14.0]
  - protobuf [required: >=3.4.0, installed: 3.5.1]
    - setuptools [required: Any, installed: 38.4.0]
    - six [required: >=1.9, installed: 1.11.0]
  - six [required: >=1.10.0, installed: 1.11.0]
  - tensorflow-tensorboard [required: <1.6.0,>=1.5.0, installed: 1.5.0]
    - bleach [required: ==1.5.0, installed: 1.5.0]
      - html5lib [required: >=0.999,!=0.9999,!=0.99999,<0.99999999, installed: 0.9999999]
        - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
      - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
    - futures [required: >=3.1.1, installed: 3.1.1]
    - html5lib [required: ==0.9999999, installed: 0.9999999]
      - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
    - markdown [required: >=2.6.8, installed: 2.6.11]
    - numpy [required: >=1.12.0, installed: 1.14.0]
    - protobuf [required: >=3.4.0, installed: 3.5.1]
      - setuptools [required: Any, installed: 38.4.0]
      - six [required: >=1.9, installed: 1.11.0]
    - six [required: >=1.10.0, installed: 1.11.0]
    - werkzeug [required: >=0.11.10, installed: 0.14.1]
    - wheel [required: >=0.26, installed: 0.30.0]
    - wheel [required: Any, installed: 0.30.0]
  - wheel [required: >=0.26, installed: 0.30.0]

body:
@zhiruiwang `bleach` depends on `html5lib`. 

So it would be enough to update `bleach`.

Extract from `pipdeptree` command:
```
tensorflow==1.5.0
  - absl-py [required: >=0.1.6, installed: 0.1.9]
    - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
  - numpy [required: >=1.12.1, installed: 1.14.0]
  - protobuf [required: >=3.4.0, installed: 3.5.1]
    - setuptools [required: Any, installed: 38.4.0]
    - six [required: >=1.9, installed: 1.11.0]
  - six [required: >=1.10.0, installed: 1.11.0]
  - tensorflow-tensorboard [required: <1.6.0,>=1.5.0, installed: 1.5.0]
    - bleach [required: ==1.5.0, installed: 1.5.0]
      - html5lib [required: >=0.999,!=0.9999,!=0.99999,<0.99999999, installed: 0.9999999]
        - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
      - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
    - futures [required: >=3.1.1, installed: 3.1.1]
    - html5lib [required: ==0.9999999, installed: 0.9999999]
      - six [required: Any, installed: 1.11.0]
    - markdown [required: >=2.6.8, installed: 2.6.11]
    - numpy [required: >=1.12.0, installed: 1.14.0]
    - protobuf [required: >=3.4.0, installed: 3.5.1]
      - setuptools [required: Any, installed: 38.4.0]
      - six [required: >=1.9, installed: 1.11.0]
    - six [required: >=1.10.0, installed: 1.11.0]
    - werkzeug [required: >=0.11.10, installed: 0.14.1]
    - wheel [required: >=0.26, installed: 0.30.0]
    - wheel [required: Any, installed: 0.30.0]
  - wheel [required: >=0.26, installed: 0.30.0]
```
